attributes.action: stop using our taxes for personal use.i.e doing up there second homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i object to our taxes being used for mps to renovate thier second homes, paying members of thier families without doing any work and sending thier children to a private school.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
